content:
"The Dawn Wall" and "What the Health" are both thought-provoking and inspiring documentaries that will keep you engaged.

"The Dawn Wall" is an incredible story of human perseverance and determination, and the cinematography is stunning. You'll be on the edge of your seat as you watch Tommy and Kevin's journey to conquer the Dawn Wall.

"What the Health" is a well-researched and informative documentary that will challenge your perspectives on health and nutrition. It's a great follow-up to "The Game Changers", and it will give you a deeper understanding of the benefits of a plant-based diet.

Let me know what you think of them after you've watched them!
